channel.title: AWS on Jamikal Hall - Blue Teamer
channel.description: Recent content in AWS on Jamikal Hall - Blue Teamer

item.title: Building a CI/CD Pipeline with Hugo
item.description: I do not particularly like front-end development. I don’t hate it, but I find building systems and working on the backend to be far more interesting. When working on the Cloud Resume Challenge, a lot of it is contingent on having a front-end for viewers to see. I decided that I want to be able to work on the later stages of the challenges, but not have to build an entire blog from scratch.
